alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 20 at 7:26PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Salt Lake...southwestern Davis and northeastern Tooele Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 725 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Delle, or 13 miles northwest of Grantsville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stansbury Park, Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway, Lake Point and Erda. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 71 and 108. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys
